market_entry.name: Pentaho Marketplace
market_entry.description: Pentaho Marketplace allows users to explore and test the plugins that are most relevant to them. This means high quality and useful plugins that users can use to get the most out of their business.
market_entry.author: Pentaho

market_entry.name: Community Dashboards Framework
market_entry.description: Community Dashboard Framework (CDF) is the engine that allows you to create friendly, powerful and fully featured Dashboards on top of the Pentaho Business Intelligence server.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community Data Access
market_entry.description: Community Data Access (CDA) is a Pentaho plugin designed for accessing data with great flexibility. Born for overcoming some cons of the older implementation, CDA allows you to access any of the various Pentaho data sources.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community Dashboard Editor
market_entry.description:
The Community Dashboard Editor (CDE) is the outcome of real-world needs: It was born to greatly simplify the creation, edition and rendering of dashboards.
CDE and the technology underneath (CDF, CDA and CCC) allows to develop and deploy dashboards in the Pentaho platform in a fast and effective way.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community Graphics Generator
market_entry.description: The CGG (Community Graphics Generator) is a Pentaho Plugin that allows the user to export CCC/CDE charts as images, enabling the inclusion of CDE charts inside Pentaho reports. Quite simply, this plugin is able to render, on server-side, exactly the same chart that is rendered on the browser by CDE/CDF.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Sparkl - Pentaho Application Builder
market_entry.description: Sparkl, or Pentaho Application Builder, is a plugin creator instrument that sits on 2 major cornerstones of the Pentaho ecosystem: Ctools and PDI. Aiming to leverage as much as possible of our existing stack, anyone familiar with those tools will be able to build plugins.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: D3 Component Library
market_entry.description: This project holds d3 components to be used in Pentaho, both on Analyzer and on CTools dashboards. The idea is to provide some helper functions that allows to quickly port examples from the d3 gallery page and implement them as components to be used in the Pentaho platform.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Saiku Analytics
market_entry.description: Saiku is a modular open-source analysis suite offering lightweight OLAP which remains easily embeddable, extendable and configurable. Our RESTful server connects to existing OLAP systems, which then powers user-friendly, intuitive analytics via our lightweight JQuery based frontend.
market_entry.author: Meteorite BI

version.name: Stable
version.description: 3.0.8 Enterprise Release for Pentaho BI Server. Enhanced Charting and Date Filters, UI tweaks and Support. For more information contact info@meteorite.bi.

version.name: Stable
version.description: 3.0.8 release for the Saiku Plugin - Fixed Filter Dialog and added Chart Export

market_entry.name: Saiku Chart Plus
market_entry.description:
What is Saiku Chart Plus?

It is an open source project that helps Pentaho BI users to create other types of charts and maps based on Saiku Project, Highcharts and Google Maps.





Requirements
Uninstall your Saiku version and install Saiku version 3, this is really necessary!

For more information visit our site.
Having trouble with this project? Feel free to send us an e-mail at info@it4biz.com.br
market_entry.author: IT4biz

market_entry.name: Pentaho CE Audit
market_entry.description:
What is Pentaho CE Audit Plugin?

It is an open source project that helps Pentaho BI Admin users to visualize statistics like:

  • Who is logging in the BI Portal (Pentaho BI Server)?
  • When are the users using the BI Portal?
  • What is the content with more access?
  • And a lot of others infos about the use of the BI Portal.

This plug-in will apply automatically an Environment configuration, if you want to know more about it please visit the link Pentaho InfoCenter.

For more information visit our site.

Having trouble with this project? Feel free to send us an e-mail at info@it4biz.com.br or create a issue.
market_entry.author: IT4biz
market_entry.installation_notes:
You can run the Pentaho CE Audit Installer as an administrator from the Tools menu. The installer will make some Environment configurations, requiring a reboot in the end.

Please note that if you upgrade Pentaho CE Audit, you will need to run the Pentaho CE Audit Installer again.

It is mandatory to click on the "Refresh Button" on the Pentaho CE Audit Admin Screen to get the most updated data.

market_entry.name: IvyBC - Ivy Bootstrap Components (Free)
market_entry.description:
The Ivy BC is a suite of additional CDE Components that allow you to quickly and easily create responsive bootstrap dashboards. Each of these components comes with many options that allow you advanced control on their look and behaviour

Included Bootstrap Components - Free

  • Bootstrap Panel
  • Bootstrap Button
  • Bootstrap Checkbox
  • Bootstrap Radio Button
  • Bootstrap Select
  • Bootstrap Data Table

Samples & Documentation

The IvyBC Plugin also includes extensive component samples and coumentation that you can open in the CDE and edit as you like

IvyBC - Professional

We also offer a professional version of IvyBC that can be purchased from the Ivy IS Website. This version includes various other components and features

Buy Now





For more information visit our site.
Having trouble with this project? Feel free to report a issue on GitHub


This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License. Any question copyright question contact Ivy Information Systems Ltd.
market_entry.author: Ivy Information Systems Ltd

market_entry.name: IvyDD - Ivy Dashboard Designer
market_entry.description:
The IvyDD or Ivy Dashboard Designer is a Pentaho Plugin that allows you to quickly and easily create responsive, mobile dashboards using either Saiku or Community Data Access (CDA) files. Use the IvyDD to create dashboards in minutes instead of hours.





For more information visit our site.
Having trouble with this project? Feel free to report a issue on GitHub


This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-NoDerivatives 4.0 International License. Any question copyright question contact Ivy Information Systems Ltd.
market_entry.author: Ivy Information Systems Ltd

market_entry.name: IvySE - Ivy Schema Editor
market_entry.description:
This web based mondrian schema editor is developed on the new Bootstrap framework which means it has a responsive UI that will work on mobile devices ('have a look in your mobile').



Some of the features in this 0.0.3 release:

  • New XML schema validation
  • New Remove schema
  • Web Browser Based
  • List existing Mondrian Schemas
  • Edit Mondrian Schemas
  • Based on Bootstrap
  • Create new schema
  • Live preview with Penatho Analyser and/or Saiku pluigns

What is the road map for the next version?

  • ...


For more information visit our site.
Having trouble with this project? Feel free to report a issue on GitHub
market_entry.author: Ivy Information Systems
market_entry.dependencies: CDE, CDA, CDF, Saiku or Pentaho Analyzer

market_entry.name: IvyDC - Ivy Dashboard Components
market_entry.description:
This is a plugin with custom CDE Components to use in your dashboards.



Some of the features in this 0.0.4 release:

  • New Comparison / Pyramid Chart
  • New Funnel Chart
  • Summary Component
  • Export Data Component
  • Pentaho Analyzer Component
  • Ion Range Slider Component
  • JustGage Component
  • Vectormap Component
  • Videoplayer Component
  • Samples
  • Documentation

What is the road map for the next version?

  • ...


For more information visit our site.
Having trouble with this project? Feel free to report a issue on GitHub
market_entry.author: Ivy Information Systems

market_entry.name: IvyGS - Ivy Git Sync
market_entry.description:
A plugin that help synchronize a git repository with pentaho.


For more information visit our site.
Having trouble with this project? Feel free to report a issue on GitHub
market_entry.author: Ivy Information Systems Ltd

market_entry.name: OpenI-Pentaho Plugin
market_entry.description: OpenI plugin for Pentaho CE provides a simple and clean user interface to visualize data in OLAP cubes. It supports both direct Mondrian and xmla based connections, plus provides add-on features like Explore Cube Data, custom SQL for drillthrough data, publishing drillthrough data to external web services etc.
market_entry.author: OpenI

version.name: OpenI-Pentaho 3.0.1
version.description: OpenI Plugin is available on both sourceforge.net(http://sourceforge.net/projects/openi) and github(https://www.github.com/openi/)

version.name: OpenI-Pentaho 3.0.2
version.description: Point Release for Pentaho 5.0. Available on both SF.net(http://sourceforge.net/projects/openi) and GitHub(https://www.github.com/openi/)

market_entry.name: Pivot4J Analytics
market_entry.description: Pivot4J provides a common API for OLAP servers which can be used to build an analytical service frontend with pivot style GUI. Pivot4J Analytics is a full fledged OLAP client application built with the Pivot4J core API, which can be used as a drop-in replacement for legacy the JPivot web application.
market_entry.author: Pivot4J Project

market_entry.name: Change Password
market_entry.description: Plugin that allows the user logged in change its password.
market_entry.author: Kleyson Rios
market_entry.installation_notes: This plugin requires CDA and CDE installed in the Pentaho BIServer and has been developed using Sparkl.</br> Change Password option will be available under File menu. </br> After installation edit the pentaho-solutions\system\changePassword\cpp.xml file and configure an user/password with admin permission.

market_entry.name: BTable
market_entry.description: BTable is a component for the Community Dashboard Designer (CDE) that extends the standard Table Component with OLAP functionalities and provides a new drill experience... drill anywhere!
market_entry.author: Biz Tech

market_entry.name: Alfresco Audit Analysis and Reporting
market_entry.description:
Plugin that allows you to install and use Alfresco Audit Analysis and Reporting (A.A.A.R.).

With A.A.A.R. is provided a solution to extract, store and analyze audit data together with the document/folder informations at a very detailed level, with the goal to be useful to the end-user in a very easy way.
market_entry.author: Francesco Corti
market_entry.installation_notes: This plugin requires CDA and CDE installed in the Pentaho BIServer and has been developed using Sparkl. All the configurations, logs, sources and scripts are stored in the AAAR folder.

version.name: Stable
version.description:
Plugin that allows you to install and use Alfresco Audit Analysis and Reporting (A.A.A.R.).

With A.A.A.R. is provided a solution to extract, store and analyze audit data together with the document/folder informations at a very detailed level, with the goal to be useful to the end-user in a very easy way.
version.changelog: - Dashboard on audit trail. - Free analysis on Saiku and Pivot4j. - Brand new report on documents per site. - CMIS Input plugin with the Open CMIS v0.12. - Bugfixes.

version.name: Trunk
version.description:
Plugin that allows you to install and use Alfresco Audit Analysis and Reporting (A.A.A.R.).

With A.A.A.R. is provided a solution to extract, store and analyze audit data together with the document/folder informations at a very detailed level, with the goal to be useful to the end-user in a very easy way.
version.changelog: - Custom metadata are imported into the data mart with the purpose to be analyzed (wokflow comprised). - CMIS Input plugin improved in performance. - Bugfix of the AAAR_Extract. - Bugfix of the port of the installation dashboard. - Bugfix of the postgresql extraction on a CMIS query.

version.name: Stable
version.description:
Plugin that allows you to install and use Alfresco Audit Analysis and Reporting (A.A.A.R.).

With A.A.A.R. is provided a solution to extract, store and analyze audit data together with the document/folder informations at a very detailed level, with the goal to be useful to the end-user in a very easy way.
version.changelog: - Developed the dashboards used as installation wizard and instructions on how to use the solution. - Added the repository structure in the Pentaho containing dashboards and reports. - Developed the main dashboard as hub of reports. - Added the configuration file for the installation, extraction and publication processes. - Added the log file for the installation, extraction and publication processes. - Updated the script file with sevarl feature like: log file, silent parameter, configuration file.

market_entry.name: Pentaho Repository Synchronizer
market_entry.description:
Pentaho Repository Synchronizer allows you to interact with the solution repository of Pentaho 5 by keeping the disk-based file structure synchronized with the Pentaho internal solution repository (JCR).

This is a pilot release, use at your own risk and report any issues / feedback back to Webdetails bug tracker
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.installation_notes: This plugin copies a version of libpensol.*.jar to the server's WEB-INF/lib. It's possible that on Windows boxes there's an error upgrading the repositorySynchronizer. If that happens, stop the server and delete the WEB-INF/lib/libpensol.* jar file(s)

market_entry.name: Pentaho Log Manager
market_entry.description: Pentaho Log Manager allows you to view, download, and delete Pentaho BI Server logs in the Pentaho User Console.
market_entry.author: Inquidia Consulting

version.name: Version 1.1
version.description: Pentaho Log Manager allows you to view, download, and delete Pentaho BI Server logs in the Pentaho User Console.

version.name: TRUNK
version.description: Pentaho Log Manager allows you to view, download, and delete Pentaho BI Server logs in the Pentaho User Console.

market_entry.name: Community Data Validation
market_entry.description: In the words of one of the wise men who are still around: "Our business isn't displaying stats, ours is the confidence business". The system we created to instantly detect and report data related errors, CDV, is key to achieve absolute accuracy in the numbers our dashboards display.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community Distributed Cache
market_entry.description: CDC stands for Community Distributed Cache and allows for high-performance, scalable and distributed memory clustering cache based on Hazelcast for both CDA and Mondrian.
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.installation_notes: Please remember to copy the contents of system/cdc/pentaho-lib to webapps/pentaho/WEB-INF/lib.

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Community File Repository
market_entry.description: CFR (Community File Repository) is a new CTool Plugin that allows you to setup and use a file repository from inside Pentaho. You can use it to manage your file needs, allowing uploads and downloads from inside your dashboards.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

version.name: Trunk
version.description: Trunk Snapshot. Get the latest, edgy, still work in progress features here...

market_entry.name: Startup Rule Engine
market_entry.description:
Application that allows the user to configure Kettle jobs and transformations to be run upon specific events, such as upon session login/logout or server startup.

Report here any issues or suggestions for improvement
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.installation_notes:
You can run the Startup Rule Engine as an administrator from the Tools menu.
After installation, you'll require two server restarts.
On the first server restart, the application will patch your installation and edit system files. It will also create the folder pentaho-solutions/system/startupRules and populate it with some sample jobs and transformations. Upon the second server restart, the Startup Rule Engine will be operational..

Report here any issues or suggestions for improvement

market_entry.name: Community Startup Tabs
market_entry.description:
CST is the easiest way to define and implement the Pentaho startup tabs depending on the user that logs into the PUC (Pentaho User Console):
1) Provides an easier way to set different startup tabs for each user that logs into the PUC, based on its username or role; 2) Allows you to specify usernames or roles using regular expressions.
Ranging from a single institutional page to a list of dashboards or reports, among other contents, the tabs opened to each Pentaho User after logging into the PUC vary depending on the user preferences or his/her role in the company. Then why should we let Pentaho open always the same content for everyone?
Thanks to CST, the list of tabs opened right after the login can be automatically different, depending on the user profile.
A landing tab can optionally be presented, which can be used to any of the predefined list of tabs and each user's favorite files.
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Environment Display
market_entry.description:
Plugin that gives information about system and session environment information useful for development and debugging. Even though it's not sensitive information, it's not recommended to have this plugin installed in a production environment

Report here any issues or suggestions for improvement
market_entry.author: Webdetails

market_entry.name: Pentaho Analytics Shell
market_entry.description: Pash is a shell interface to Pentaho Analysis. It provides command-line access to mondrian straight from within your webbrowser. The shell allows you to list the available mondrian catalogs, cubes, dimensions etc, and you can type and run ad-hoc MDX queries. After installation, the shell is available in the Tools menu
market_entry.author: Roland Bouman

market_entry.name: WAQR
market_entry.description: WAQR (Web Adhoc Query and Reporting) is a report generation tool based on Web 2.0 technology (AJAX, DHTML) designed to help typical business users easily generate adhoc reports using the Pentaho BI platform. It provides a user interface that helps the user quickly identify and group the data of interest, apply constraints to the data, and generate a report. The resulting reports are viewable through WAQR's Preview feature, or through a Pentaho-platform based web application.
market_entry.author: Pentaho Legacy - Plugins developed by Pentaho but no longer supported

market_entry.name: Fusion Charts Plugin
market_entry.description:
Pentaho FusionCharts plugin allows creating Killer Data Visualizations on Pentaho Business Analytics through a seamless integration with the FusionCharts library. The latest update includes access to real-time charts, widgets and maps all this optimized for mobile devices as well as many other exciting features. The plugin allows using FusionCharts on EE Dashboards, CDF, CDE and Analyzer.

Note: This plugin requires Pentaho version 5.0 or higher. To start using this plugin for free, you need to fill the form at the Xpand IT website and request your license. Once you get the key you just need to insert it on the Pentaho User Console through the menu entry "Tools" -> "FusionChartsManager" and start using Pentaho FusionCharts Plugin. For more information you can check the wiki.
market_entry.author: Xpand IT

market_entry.name: Bissol Table Data Editor
market_entry.description:
Bissol Table Data Editor

Warning: This plugin has only been tested on Postgresql and MariaDB. It is highly recommended that you do not use this plugin in production. This project is in the early stages and once we've received feedback from more users, we will classify this plugin as stable.

Intended Purpose of the Plugin

The Bissol Table Data Editor (BTDE) Pentaho BI Server Plugin allows you to update and add data to small database tables via an easy-to-use web-interface.

Example Use Cases:

  • Maintaining attribute fields in dimension tables. For some dimensions in a star schema you might ask end-users to add some additional information which is otherwise not available.
  • Maintaining custom configuration tables
  • Maintaining custom metadata tables

Note: The emphasis is on maintaining small tables. The definition of small is anything that fits on a standard screen, so ideally less than a hundred records.





For more information visit the Github project site.
Please report issues and improvement ideas on GitHub
market_entry.author: Diethard Steiner (Bissol Consulting Ltd)
market_entry.installation_notes: You must restart the biserver after installing this plugin, because on installation this plugin adds following Pentaho Kettle steps to the biserver Kettle folder: BAServerUtils and JDBC Metadata. Only after you restarted the biserver, these Kettle steps will be registered.

market_entry.name: Pentaho Database Inspection Service
market_entry.description: Pedis is a contentgenerator (i.e. a webservice) that provides JDBC metadata for Pentaho JDBC connections.
market_entry.author: Roland Bouman
market_entry.installation_notes: You must restart the biserver after installing this plugin.

market_entry.name: Pentaho Analysis Editor
market_entry.description: Phase is a mondrianV3 schema editor. Phase is available in the Tools menu as "Pentaho Analysis Editor".
market_entry.author: Roland Bouman
market_entry.installation_notes: Please make sure you install Pedis if you want to use Phase. For a first-time install, restart the Pentaho server. When re-installing or updating, you must refresh the pentaho user console to start using this application.

market_entry.name: Catalan Language Pack Installer
market_entry.description:
This plugin installs language definitions for the Catalan language in Pentaho 5

Report here any translation issues or suggestions for improvement This plugin installs language definitions for the Catalan language in Pentaho 5
market_entry.documentation_url: This plugin installs language definitions for the Catalan language in Pentaho 5

market_entry.installation_notes:
You can run the Language Pack Installer as an administrator from the Tools menu. The installer will then copy the language packs over your installation, requiring a reboot in the end.

Please note that if you upgrade one of the translated plugins, you will need to run the Language Pack Installer again.

Report here any translation issues or suggestions for improvement

market_entry.name: Emerald Theme
market_entry.description: Pentaho Emerald Theme.
market_entry.author: Webdetails
market_entry.installation_notes: Select the Emerald theme from the View menu.

market_entry.name: PDI MySQL Plugin
market_entry.description: This plugin also contains the GPL MySQL JDBC Driver version 5
market_entry.author: Pentaho
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a Pentaho Data Integration Enterprise Edition support contract.

market_entry.name: PDI NuoDB Plugin
market_entry.description: This plugin also contains the NuoDB JDBC Driver
market_entry.author: NuoDB
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a NuoDB Enterprise Edition support contract.

market_entry.name: Apple Push Notification
market_entry.description: This is a plugin that allows to you send push notifications from Pentaho Data Integration to any iOS and OSX devices, using Apple's Push Notification Services. This plugin is written in Java and uses the Java Apple Push Notification Service library. The motivation for developing this plugin is to have you, the ETL developer, receive quick notifications about the state of ETL executions wherever you are (faster than email). However, this plugin can be use for other scenarios as well. Now is just for PDI 5.x or later.
market_entry.author: Joel Latino
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a PDI Apple Push Notifications github project contract.

market_entry.name: Android Push Notification
market_entry.description: This is a plugin that allows you to send push notifications from Pentaho Data Integration to any android application with GCM services. The motivation for developing this plugin is to have you, the ETL developer, receive fast notifications about the state of ETL executions wherever you are (than faster email). You can use my android app named PDI Manager: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.latinojoel.pdimanager However, this plugin can be used in other scenarios as well. Now is just for PDI 5.x or later.
market_entry.author: Joel Latino
market_entry.support_message: Supported by a PDI Android Push Notifications github project contract.

market_entry.name: DataCleaner Data Profiling for Kettle version 5 or higher
market_entry.description:
Use DataCleaner - the premier open source data quality solution - to profile the data that you work with in Pentaho Data Integration.
DataCleaner provides strong functionality in the area of Data Profiling and Data Quality analysis. This includes discovering patterns and anomalies, standardizing data as well as detecting duplicate records.
With this plugin you can:
* Launch data profiling for any transformation step in PDI, effectively allowing you to inspect and discover the shape of data at any point in your transformation pipeline. * Apply DataCleaner to your database from the database explorer of PDI. This allows you to investigate the data at it's source. * Include and launch DataCleaner jobs as part of your PDI jobs. This allows you to merge the ongoing workflow of data quality and data integration.
market_entry.author: Neopost Customer Information Management
market_entry.license_text: For more details about the GNU General Lesser Public License v2.0 see: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.0.html
market_entry.support_message: Professional support, extended functionality, training and consultancy for DataCleaner is offered via the commercial editions of DataCleaner.

market_entry.name: EasyDataQuality for Pentaho
market_entry.description:
Combine the leading open source ETL tool with the leading data cleansing functions!
EasyDQ.com delivers on demand Data Quality functions that are fully integrated with Pentaho Data Integration / Kettle.
Data Quality functions by Human Inference and EasyDQ.com available in Pentaho Data Integration:
* Data profiling (through DataCleaner) * Name cleansing * Address cleansing * Phone cleansing * Email cleansing * Detect and merge duplicates (through DataCleaner)
Register now at www.easydq.com and start increasing the quality of your data.
market_entry.author: EasyDQ - Human Inference
market_entry.license_text: To get access to EasyDQ.com and the data quality services, please register at https://www.easydq.com/register
market_entry.support_message: Please contact Human Inference Support at +31 (0)26 3550600 or email support@humaninference.com

market_entry.name: MDCheck
market_entry.description:
Melissa Data Contact Verification Tools:
Contact Verify Component • Standardize, verify, and correct U.S. and Canadian addresses • Add County and census information. • Verify and normalize U.S. and Canadian phones on a 7-10 digit level • Parse names, genderize, and detect suspicious words or companies in name field • Geocode addresses by assigning rooftop lat/long coordinates • USPS CASS certified engine
Processing Options - (Local)(Cloud)(Dedicated Cloud)
SmartMover Component • U.S./Canadian change of address processing to update addresses of people or businesses that have moved • USPS Certified NCOA (National Change of Address)
Processing Options -(Cloud Only)
MatchUp Component • Identify duplicate records with domain specific knowledge of contact information • Allows users to define and customize powerful matching algorithms based on their data.
Processing Options -(Local Only)
IP Locator Component • Identify web visitor's geographic location • Append Latitude, longitude, ISP, City, State, Country • Reduce fraud and geo target
Processing Options -(Local)(Cloud)(Dedicated Cloud)

market_entry.support_message: Please contact Technical Support at 1-800-800-6245 x4 or email tech@melissadata.com

Global Verify Component • Address verification for over 240 countries • Parses and Standardizes data based on country specific rules • Transliteration of many major character sets and display output in either native or Roman characters • Append Geographic coordinates for many worldwide postal addresses.
Processing Options -(Cloud Only)

market_entry.name: MDPersonator

Melissa Data Personator Component - Offering Melissa Data's flagship service in an easy to use Pentaho Component
• Verifies name corresponds to address, email, and phone data • Appends missing name and company name, phone number, and/or email address • Append Latitude, Longitude along with County and Census data. • Free-form input allows for unparsed or un-delimited data. The service then can parse, standardize, correct, verify and append missing information. • Move update - Identifies moves with up to a 10 year history.
Processing Options -(Cloud Only)

market_entry.name: PDI Tableau Data Extract Output Plugin
market_entry.description:
The Tableau Data Extract plugin for Pentaho Data Integration allows you to use Pentaho's ETL capabilities to generate a Tableau Data Extract (tde) file. You can then publish the TDE file to a Tableau server or use the TDE in Tableau Desktop.
Due to licensing the Tableau Data Extract API is not distributed through the Pentaho Marketplace and requires additional installation. Instructions to download and install the Tableau Data Extract API are available in the README or at: https://github.com/cdeptula/tdeoutputplugin
market_entry.author: Inquidia Consulting
market_entry.installation_notes:
Due to licensing the Tableau Data Extract API is not distributed through the Pentaho Marketplace and must be separately downloaded and installed using the instructions below.
1. Install the Tableau Data Exract Output plugin from the Pentaho marketplace. 2. Download the "C/C++/Java" data extract API from Tableau for your environment. Choose the 32 bit or 64 bit version based on your Java JDK. - http://www.tableausoftware.com/data-extract-api 3. Unzip the downloaded zip. 4. For PDI 5.0 and above - Copy the contents of the Java directory to ${PDI_HOME}/plugins/steps/TDEOutputPlugin directory. 5. For PDI 4.8 and below - Copy the contents of the Java6 directory to ${PDI_HOME}/plugins/steps/TDEOutputPlugin directory. 6. For Windows - Add the bin folder from the downloaded Tableau API zip to your system path variable. 7. For Linux - Add the lib folder from the downloaded Tableau API zip to the LD_LIBRARY_PATH variable. 8. Restart PDI

market_entry.name: JaRE - Java Rule Engine
market_entry.description:
Check data against rules defined in an external file. The advantage being that the logic is not defined in the transformation but externally. If the logic changes, then the transformation does not need to be touched.
Having the rules outside the ETL process in a central location is more transparent for the users and the ETL process is cleaner.
There is a web application available for the maintenance of the rule logic in the form of projects.
Rules are defined in groups and subgroups allowing to combine them with flexible and/or conditions. So a group may pass the check even though some of the rules might have failed. You have optimum flexibility to define your simple or komplex logic.
The rule engine also allows for actions depending on the result of the business rules. These actions may update fields, calculate values or do other modifications.
Detailed documentation on the rule engine: https://github.com/uwegeercken/jareplugin/blob/master/plugins/steps/JarePlugin/jare_v0.60.pdf
Find source code and files on github.com/uwegeercken
market_entry.author: Uwe Geercken / Datamelt

market_entry.name: Probabilistic Row Distributions for PDI
market_entry.description:
This is a collection of Row Distribution plugins for PDI that use probabilistic methods for determining the distribution of rows. The collection currently includes:
- Uniformly random: Distributes rows to each target step with equal probability. For example, if you distribute from a step to 4 target steps, then each row has a 25% chance of being sent to a particular target step.
- Markov chains: Distributes rows based on a specification file that assigns probabilities to hops. For example, the markov_hops.txt file in the plugin specifies probabilities from a Generate Zeroes step to calculator steps with varying probabilities. Note that the sum of probabilities for all hops from a step must equal 1.0.
These can be used to perform random walks of transformations. This is intended to aid in the use of PDI as a graphical tool for statistical analysis.
market_entry.author: Matt Burgess
market_entry.license_text: For more details about the Apache v2.0 license see: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
market_entry.support_message: Supported by the Pentaho Data Integration developer community.
